title: Never surrender is bs
body:
honestly i start to get really stressed out when im 13/3/5 and my whole team is getting destroyed. We have a shit comp and because we didnt end fast enough they got fed by my team and were unstoppable. Not to mention there amumu was level 30 and we all level 15. 
All towers getting destoyed and they wont ff. 
These people man like what you gonna carry ? 
At this point they only dont ff because they like wasting more of my time.
If i fed and my team started a surreder vote i would say yes... im not an assholee

replies.body:
..Lv30 amumu..?

Get a grip, be a good sport. Surrendering is a bad habit and usually ends up being negative. I see crazy comebacks all the time, but not when some kid is crying rivers.

ya.. so have i but i understand when the game is absolutely unwinnable. 
You might enjoy getting you ass pounded in over and over..

I enjoy not having 30-minute queue times to get in a game due to infantile leavers who ragequit as soon as they get a lane they dont like.

If you cant play the game, dont play the game.
I have come back from a lot of huge deficits, I'm talking like, all my inhibs gone and nexus exposed coming back and winning with them having all turrets, things can happen, don't surrender.

My team almost won a 4v5 when our Threah lagged out at the beginning. 

https://uproxx.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/galaxy-quest-never-give-up-never-surrender.gif?w=526&h=222

Had an open nexus once, when they had all inner turrets. Still won. I get that surrendering is easier, and a lot (most) of the time, you'll end in defeat anyways, but it's worth it to try for the win IMO. I think surrendering is acceptable in normals, but never in ranked. Just my thoughts.
